data.title: Ethereum Approaches Major Upgrade With Ropsten Public Testnet
data.text: Ethereum's core development team has reached a new milestone with the release of the Ropsten public testnet, which will now undergo an upgrade to its revised proof-of-stake consensus algorithm, in anticipation its implementation on the Ethereum mainnet. The upgrade is scheduled for June 8th, with the code for its configuration appearing in a pull request made by Ethereum DevOps engineer Parathi Jayanathi (parithosh).
